attributes.action: intervene and protect  HBOS from an unnecessary merger with Lloyds-TSB
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This proposed merger has been brought about by speculators and hedge funds and should not be allowed.  The government should take immediate steps to warn off speculators and make a positive statement about HBOS' viability.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
